mapper.select: SELECT TCI.ORG_NM FROM tc_cm_inst AS TCI WHERE 1=1 AND TCI.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS no, TCKI.EXAM_ITEM_CD AS examItemCd, TCKI.EXAM_ITEM AS examItem, TCKI.TRGTER AS trgter FROM tn_cm_kdsqc_item AS TCKI, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 AND TCKI.TRGTER = #{trgter} AND TCKI.USE_YN = 'Y'
